topic.title: How to Factory Reset Snom Phones
topic.shortdesc: Before you start to provision Snom phones with , you need to reset Snom phones to factory default settings. Otherwise, Auto Provision may fail because of the previous configurations on the phone.

body.p: This guide takes Snom D745 running firmware 8.9.3.80 as an example.

p.note: The following steps are applicable to snom D1, D3, 7, D7 and 8 Series. For other phones, you can do a factory reset via network recovery.

ol.li: Press and Hold # key to reboot the phone.
Keep holding the # key until you see the Rescue Mode.
Press 1 key for a settings reset.

Press any key when prompted to reboot.
The phone will be reset successfully after startup.
Do not power off during phone startup.
